channel.title: Warnings
channel.description:
What the hell is with this retarded warning system?
[quote="moparisthebest.com"]eczema3,
You have received a warning for spamming. Please cease these activities and abide by the forum rules otherwise we will take further action.
Regards, The Moparisthebest.com Team.[/quote]
It's nice how it tells me where I did wrong!

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:345452”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=441830.msg3245415#msg3245415 date=1277316809]
For the record: Cool thanks for giving me a warning for a post i made in April, and that has been dead for a long time. Bright admin right there!
[/quote]

There is no statute of limitations around here, if you spammed in 2006 and weren’t punished for it we can still do it today! :D[/quote]
Coming up on Cold Case…

Read full topic

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:345452”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=441830.msg3245415#msg3245415 date=1277316809]
For the record: Cool thanks for giving me a warning for a post i made in April, and that has been dead for a long time. Bright admin right there!
[/quote]

There is no statute of limitations around here, if you spammed in 2006 and weren’t punished for it we can still do it today! :D[/quote]Sounds pretty fuckin’ retarded if you ask me.

Read full topic

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @Frostie21 Frostie21
item.description:
@Frostie21 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:13, topic:345452”]I don’t even see the point of warnings on MITB. It’s basically the same 30 people who are active here. Obviously you can warn some members multiple times and they will continue activities.

This side of the site doesn’t get huge activity. I think MSCP is what needs the warnings, not MITB.

Also, I want to know which mod warned me when I receive one, I hate how I have to ask on IRC to find out.[/quote]

Well clearly it must make some people think twice before making a retarded post,or else there wouldn’t be topics like this.

Read full topic

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I don’t even see the point of warnings on MITB. It’s basically the same 30 people who are active here. Obviously you can warn some members multiple times and they will continue activities.

This side of the site doesn’t get huge activity. I think MSCP is what needs the warnings, not MITB.

Also, I want to know which mod warned me when I receive one, I hate how I have to ask on IRC to find out.

Read full topic

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:11, topic:345452”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=441830.msg3245481#msg3245481 date=1277320928]

For the record: Cool thanks for giving me a warning for a post i made in April, and that has been dead for a long time. Bright admin right there!

There is no statute of limitations around here, if you spammed in 2006 and weren’t punished for it we can still do it today!
[/quote]Oh ok, then let’s go back in time and infract every single person who has done anything that breaks the rules. Let’s see how much the global moderators will enjoy that![/quote]
We don’t HAVE to, we just can. That was my point.

Ideally we would catch every single infraction within an hour or so of when it was made, unfortunately we have way too many posts and too few staff for that, so we do the best we can with what we have.

Read full topic

Let’s see how much the global moderators will enjoy that!

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

eczema3:

It’s nice how it tells me where I did wrong!

I did post in the thread, I thought that would make it pretty clear.

Unless you feel that you spam often enough that you can’t tell which one you were warned for?

Read full topic

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

He best have had a warning too then.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

[quote=“http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,4.0.html”]Rule 12:
We respect each other and other communities. We do not flame. There is to be no fighting on the forums.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’m pretty sure it was from this thread:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Anyhow, when we click the warn icon on the post/thread, it does show you where you were warned from, but if we go to your account and warn you from there, you don’t get shown anything. Obviously the latter is what happened.

Read full topic

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

The template should display the URL and thread title of the thread the warning was issued in.

Read full topic
